trans-unit.source: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un'operazione di aggiornamento della singola riga espressa come albero dei comandi.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>è impostata, il comando restituisce un lettore; in caso contrario, restituisce un valore scalare che indica il numero di righe interessate.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> che specifica il predicato utilizzato per determinare quali membri della raccolta di destinazione devono essere aggiornati.

trans-unit.source: The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.
trans-unit.target: Il predicato può includere solo gli elementi seguenti: uguaglianza che rappresentano un <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; un <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression>che fa riferimento la destinazione. <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> che specifica il predicato utilizzato per determinare quali membri della raccolta di destinazione devono essere aggiornati.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> che specifica una proiezione di risultati da restituire in base alle righe modificate.

trans-unit.source: The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.
trans-unit.target: La proiezione restituita include solo gli elementi seguenti: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.</xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression></xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"></xref> that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbExpression"> </xref> che specifica una proiezione di risultati da restituire in base alle righe modificate.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> indicates that no results should be returned from this command.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>indica che questo comando deve essere restituito alcun risultato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elenco di aggiornamento di set di clausole che definiscono l'operazione di aggiornamento.

trans-unit.source: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco di aggiornamento impostato clausole che definiscono l'operazione di aggiornamento.
